page.title: 02A View of Industry
page.content: Standing on Rosper Road looking around us we can see fields of{barley and {wheat, cattle grazing}in the fields.But if we lift our eyes up a little we see{tall dark chimneys, large flat{storage tanks,}tall structures of steel,{clouds of smoke and a{constantly burning flame. {Woods}planted to hide the industry are not good enough. Lorries thunder past {disturbing the peace.}Looking out across the fields to the river we see next to the fields{large flat areas of {land much of it unused}but cleared for storage, other parts have piles of steel pipes or reels of thick wire or hundreds of new Volvos waiting for transport to the garages. We see the {sludge disposal unit,}the signs telling us who owns the land, small {concrete pillars}showing how deep the {pipelines}are underground.
